methods.name: arc55_threshold
methods.desc: Retrieve the signature threshold required for the multisignature to be submitted

methods.name: arc55_transactions
methods.desc: Retrieve a transaction from a given transaction group

returns.desc: A single transaction at the specified index for the transaction group nonce

methods.name: arc55_signatures
methods.desc: Retrieve a list of signatures for a given transaction group nonce and address

args.name: signer
args.desc: Address you want to retrieve signatures for

methods.name: arc55_signerByIndex
methods.desc: Find out which address is at this index of the multisignature

args.name: index
args.desc: Address at this index of the multisignature

methods.name: arc55_isSigner
methods.desc: Check if an address is a member of the multisignature

args.name: address
args.desc: Address to check is a signer

returns.desc: True if address is a signer

methods.name: arc55_setup
methods.desc: Setup On-Chain Msig App. This can only be called whilst no transaction groups have been created.

args.name: threshold
args.desc: Initial multisig threshold, must be greater than 0

args.name: addresses
args.desc: Array of addresses that make up the multisig

methods.name: arc55_newTransactionGroup
methods.desc: Generate a new transaction group nonce for holding pending transactions

methods.name: arc55_addTransaction
methods.desc: Add a transaction to an existing group. Only one transaction should be included per call

args.name: costs
args.desc: Minimum Balance Requirement for associated box storage costs: (2500) + (400 * (9 + transaction.length))

args.name: index
args.desc: Transaction position within atomic group to add

events.name: TransactionAdded
events.desc: Emitted when a new transaction is added to a transaction group

methods.name: arc55_removeTransaction
methods.desc: Remove transaction from the app. The MBR associated with the transaction will be returned to the Msig address.

args.name: index
args.desc: Transaction position within atomic group to remove

events.name: TransactionRemoved
events.desc: Emitted when a transaction has been removed from a transaction group

methods.name: arc55_setSignatures
methods.desc: Set signatures for a particular transaction group. Signatures must be included as an array of byte-arrays

args.name: costs
args.desc: Minimum Balance Requirement for associated box storage costs: (2500) + (400 * (40 + signatures.length))

events.name: SignatureSet
events.desc: Emitted when a new signature is added to a transaction group

methods.name: arc55_clearSignatures
methods.desc: Clear signatures for an address. Be aware this only removes it from the current state of the ledger, and indexers will still know and could use your signature

events.name: SignatureSet
events.desc: Emitted when a new signature is added to a transaction group

methods.name: deploy
methods.desc: Deploy a new On-Chain Msig App.

methods.name: destroy
methods.desc: Destroy the application and return funds to creator address. All transactions must be removed before calling destroy

events.name: TransactionAdded
events.desc: Emitted when a new transaction is added to a transaction group

events.name: TransactionRemoved
events.desc: Emitted when a transaction has been removed from a transaction group

events.name: SignatureSet
events.desc: Emitted when a new signature is added to a transaction group

events.name: SignatureCleared
events.desc: Emitted when a signature has been removed from a transaction group
